meanings.sent1: I will overdeck the patio with wooden planks.
meanings.sent2: The workers overdecked the ship with a new layer of paint.
meanings.sent3: Don't overdeck the cake with too much frosting!
meanings.sent4: She overdecked her presentation with colorful visuals.
meanings.sent5: The gardener overdecked the garden with beautiful flowers.

meanings.sent1: He will overdeck his friend in the game of cards.
meanings.sent2: The new design overdecks the old one in elegance.
meanings.sent3: She always manages to overdeck her classmates in creativity.
meanings.sent4: The sunset overdecks any painting with its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice overdecks all others in the room.

meanings.sent1: She tends to overdeck her outfits with too many accessories.
meanings.sent2: The decorator overdecks the room with unnecessary ornaments.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overdecked the Christmas tree with too many lights.
meanings.sent4: The artist overdecks the canvas with bold strokes of color.
meanings.sent5: The chef tends to overdeck his dishes with elaborate garnishes.
